channel.title: Can someone help me with some coding
channel.description:
hi i need help for a pimpscape server
1. how do i change max lvs 2. how do i add a barrows shop 3. how do i change max money 4. how do i change prices in store
i need to know where they go and how to work then and set them up and stuff
Thank you
Bullets

item.title: Can someone help me with some coding
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

How to change max level:

Search in Client.java for

return 99;

or whatever your max level is and change the ‘99’ part of it.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with some coding

item.title: Can someone help me with some coding
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:5, topic:43026”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=59998.msg3091226#msg3091226 date=1262910148]
sirrowd, that post is over 2 years old
and the max java int isn’t “2147000000”
its 2147483647
[/quote]But if you don’t feel like memorizing that, you can also reference it through Integer.MAX_VALUE.[/quote]

copy and paste?

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me with some coding
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

changing prices is easy, just go into item.cfg and change the price of an item. shops are also easy, in shops.cfg, just use an existing shop or create a new one, and add barrows pieces into it.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with some coding

max money is in player.java search for 999999999 or 2147000000 depending on wht one ur server is
